entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
